item.title: Changing prayer icons?
item.dc:creator: @12mil 12mil
item.description:
@12mil wrote:


i don’t know how im going to be able to make my rapid restore, and rapid heal mask into hawk eye and mystic lore, i have the sprites and here is my code that i have in “Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1”:

[code]if (s.startsWith(“CUSTOMR”))
{
try
{
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Sprites/CUSTOMR 0.png");
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

}
catch (Exception exception)
{
System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
}
}
else if (s.startsWith(“CUSTOMM”))
{
try
{
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Sprites/CUSTOMM 0.png");
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

}
catch (Exception exception)
{
System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
}
}
else if (s.startsWith(“PRAYEROFFM”))
{
try
{
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Sprites/PRAYEROFFM 0.png");
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

}
catch (Exception exception)
{
System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
}
}
else if (s.startsWith(“PRAYEROFFR”))
{
try
{
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Sprites/PRAYEROFFR 0.png");
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

}
catch (Exception exception)
{
System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
}
}[/code]
Any idea to do this?
